name: Basilisk
movement: 20 ft. walking speed, 10 ft. climbing speed
description: The Basilisk is a large, reptilian creature with eight legs and a thick, scaly hide, known for its terrifying ability to petrify its foes with its gaze.
memorable: Its ability to turn creatures to stone with its gaze makes it a uniquely formidable opponent.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush and petrify unsuspecting prey while hoarding treasures.
relations: Often solitary but can be surrounded by petrified victims or other basilisks in rare cases.
strengths: Possesses a powerful petrifying gaze that can immobilize foes, along with venomous bite attacks.
weaknesses: Low speed and poor Dexterity make it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a deadly Stone Gaze to petrify and a venomous bite that combines piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Petrifying Gaze, which can turn enemies to stone and remove them from combat.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, which allows it to see in low-light conditions.
additional_information: Can use Stone Gaze as a reaction against attackers who hit it.
Resistant to exhaustion and the frightened condition.
Tends to hoard treasures left behind by its petrified victims.
Has a low passive perception score of 9.
Relies primarily on its gaze for combat rather than physical agility.
